price: Basi leo walio amini ndio watawacheka makafiri,
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
footnotes: Basi Siku ya Malipo walio amini watakuwa ndio wa kuwacheka hao makafiri kwa kuwalipizia kile kicheko chao na kejeli yao ya duniani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
